main.title: Build faster websites.
main.text: Pull content from anywhere and serve it fast with Astro's next-gen island architecture.

children.children: Astro Islands represent a leading paradigm shift for frontend web architecture. Astro extracts your UI into smaller, isolated components on the page. Unused JavaScript is replaced with lightweight HTML, guaranteeing faster loads and time-to-interactive (TTI).

content.title: Zero JavaScript Runtime
content.text: Astro renders HTML on the server and strips away any remaining, unused JavaScript.

content.title: The Power of Islands
content.text: Need interactive UI? Load individual, non-blocking component islands in parallel.

content.title: Lazy-Loading Islands
content.text: Components only hydrate when they scroll into view. If you don't see it, Astro won't load it.
